titles: The English man's complaint If Kings were as wise and good as their office requires them to be, monarchy, certainly, would be the happiest form of government in the world; ...
notes: Title from caption and opening words of text.
Date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
